evidence_harvesting.quote: [legacy_dataset_text::fallback_intro] # Research article UDC 34:004:341.4:004.8 EDN: https://elibrary.ru/nnftqi DOI: https://doi.org/10.21202/jdtl.2024.46 # # Check for updates # Countering Cyberattacks: Gaps in International Law and Prospects for Overcoming them Mohammad Minhazur Rahman State University of Bangladesh,
evidence_harvesting.researcher_comment: Evidence sentence selected from introduction/conclusion content.

evidence_harvesting.quote: Results: the article defines the legal consequences of cyberattacks, identifies difficulties in determining and holding individuals and organizations accountable for their commission, identifies national measures to counter cyberattacks based on the principle of proportionality, and systematizes the international legal
evidence_harvesting.paraphrase: Main finding extracted from introduction/conclusion text.
evidence_harvesting.researcher_comment: Evidence sentence selected from introduction/conclusion content.

evidence_harvesting.quote: Methods: include doctrinal legal analysis, formal legal, comparative legal methods, synthesis, induction, deduction, as well as methods of legal forecasting and modeling.
evidence_harvesting.paraphrase: Method-related claim extracted from introduction/conclusion text.
evidence_harvesting.researcher_comment: Evidence sentence selected from introduction/conclusion content.

evidence_harvesting.quote: The main focus is on the urgent problems of identifying and verifying cyber weapons, establishing international standards for their use, developing methods of disarmament or limiting offensive cyber capabilities.
evidence_harvesting.paraphrase: Limitation statement extracted from introduction/conclusion text.
evidence_harvesting.researcher_comment: Evidence sentence selected from introduction/conclusion content.

evidence_harvesting.quote: International legal documents and acts of national legislation, judicial precedents, and doctrinal sources were studied.
evidence_harvesting.paraphrase: Recommendation/future-work statement extracted from introduction/conclusion text.
evidence_harvesting.researcher_comment: Evidence sentence selected from introduction/conclusion content.
